<<<<<<< HEAD
An answer to the Amicable accommodation of the difference between the representer and the answerer Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
31 p.
Printed for John Amery ... and William Rogers ..., London : MDCLXXXVI [1686]
Attributed to Sherlock by Wing. "Imprimatur, July 22. 1686. Jo. Battely" An answer to "An amicable accomodation" by John Gother. Imperfect: stained, with loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======
